content.en: Vaccine safety assessment: A series of studies have been conducted to investigate the adverse events that occur after vaccination and to assess their causality. These studies involve various organizations, including military and healthcare institutions, as well as global committees and regulatory agencies. Algorithms are used to analyze and evaluate the data collected from different populations and regions, providing valuable insights into the safety profiles of vaccines and helping to improve post-licensure surveillance.
content.da: Vaccine sikkerhedsvurdering: En række studier er blevet gennemført for at undersøge de bivirkninger, der opstår efter vaccination, og for at vurdere deres årsagssammenhæng. Disse studier involverer forskellige organisationer, herunder militære og sundhedsinstitutioner, samt globale komiteer og tilsynsmyndigheder. Algoritmer bruges til at analysere og evaluere de indsamlede data fra forskellige befolkninger og regioner, hvilket giver værdifuld indsigt i vacciners sikkerhedsprofiler og hjælper med at forbedre overvågningen efter markedsføring.
